title: London Restaurant, Bar & Terrace in Paddington | Smith's Bar & Grill

Looking for a private event space in Central London? From standing drinks reception to private dining, Smih's is the perfect place to host.
Learn More about Events at Smith's
Learn More
Item 1 of 7
London Restaurant, Bar & Outdoor Dining in Paddington
BREAKFAST | LUNCH | DINNER | DRINKS | BRUNCH | ROAST
Smith's Restaurant & Bar is a modern British inspired eatery burrowed in the heart of Paddington Basin and London’s Little Venice. The restaurant is located a stone's throw away from bustling Paddington Station, and features a large dining area, beautiful bar, comfortable lounge, and outdoor terrace. The perfect haven in central London where you can enjoy an exquisite selection of food and drinks while relaxing in comfortable surroundings. The spacious, daylight-filled venue features a gorgeous year-round terrace overlooking the beautiful Grand Union Canal, ideal for outdoor dining and drinks.
Sustainable Modern British Cuisine
Smith's serves a delicious array of modern British dishes with a focus on sustainability. The menu showcases a diverse range of seasonal delights such as sumptuous steaks, fresh seafood, and healthy salads. Sip on a delicious a refreshing selection of signature cocktails or draught beers at the bar or on our outdoor terrace. Don't see the drink that tickles your fancy? Not to worry... our bartenders are happy to make your favourite cocktail on request.
We accommodate bookings and parties of all sizes - book your table online or contact our events team for private dining and parties.
View Menu
Buy Gift Vouchers
WHAT’S ON
New Year’s Eve at Smith’s: Dinner, Drinks & Dancing in Paddington
Celebrate NYE at Smith’s with live music, 5 course dinner and an after party!
Read More →
Celebrate Twixmas in London at Smith’s Bar & Grill
Make the most of the festive in-between at Smith’s Bar & Grill this Twixmas. From 26th–30th Dec, enjoy Bottomless Brunch, a delicious evening set menu and extended Happy Hour.
Read More →
Christmas Day Feast in Paddington
Join us for a special Christmas Day 3-course menu. With festive classics, it’s the perfect way to celebrate Christmas in London.
Read More →
Festive Season at Smith’s
Looking for somewhere to gather friends & family together, or planning a Christmas treat for your work colleagues?
Read More →
Smith’s Tasting Menu with Live Music
A multiple course fine dining tasting menu with a wine pairing option and live music.
Read More →
Bottomless Brunch with Live DJ & Sax
Experience a lively dining moment at our Paddington restaurant, with bottomless food, free-flowing drinks and live music.
Read More →
Bottomless Sunday Roast at Smith’s Bar & Grill
From endless small plates, bottomless roasts, desserts and unlimited drinks! Available at Smith’s every Sunday 12pm - 9pm.
Read More →
£1 Oysters, Champagne & Live Music
A shuckin' unbelievable offer of just £1 oysters perfectly matched with sparkling wine as well as live music, cocktails and dining experiences every weekend at Smith’s.
Read More →
Sunday Roasts in Paddington
Some say happiness is a Roast lunch & being in total agreement with this statement we’re making Sundays that little bit easier…
Read More →
Breakfast at Smith’s
We’ve got your most important meal of the day sorted, so start your day right with a variety of breakfast and brunch dishes.
Read More →

Sign Up
We respect your privacy.
Thank you!
Private Events
Perfect for every occasion. Be it a wedding, on-location filming, product launch or entertainment event, private lunch or dinner party, standing reception, exhibition or presentation of any size, Smith’s dedicated events team will make sure your event is a stunning, memorable occasion.

Smiths Bar & Grill on London's Little Venice Canal in Paddington features a
large dining area, beautiful marble bar and an outdoor dining terrace
overlooking the river. A sustainable restaurant offering modern British
cuisine, open for breakfast, lunch, dinner, Saturday Brunch and Sunday
Roast.
